Survey.Title: CALL BACK INTERVIEW ON YORK FILTER CIGARETTE PRODUCT TEST

Questions.Question: About how many of the York Filter cigarettes did you yourself smoke?
What, if anything, did you particularly like about York Filter cigarettes?
What, if anything, did you particularly dislike about York Filter cigarettes?
Do you feel that YORK FILTERS offer:
Options: Much more satisfying taste than your regular brand
A little more satisfying taste than your regular brand
About the same taste satisfaction as your regular brand
A little less satisfying taste than your regular brand
Much less satisfying taste than your regular brand

Questions.Question: Do you feel that YORK FILTERS are:
Options: Much milder than your regular brand
A little milder than your regular brand
About the same as your regular brand on mildness
A little stronger than your regular brand
Much stronger than your regular brand

Questions.Question: Do you feel that the filter on YORK FILTERS is:
Options: Much easier drawing than the filter on your regular cigarette
A little easier to draw than the filter on your regular cigarette
Much harder drawing than the filter on your regular cigarette
A little harder to draw than the filter on your regular cigarette

Questions.Question: Which do you prefer York Filters or your regular brand, for:
Options: Prefer York
Prefer Regular Brand
No Preference

Questions.Question: All things considered, how would you rate York Filters? Would you say they are:
Options: Excellent
Good
Fair
Poor

Questions.Question: Like them much more or a little more?
Options: Prefer YORK FILTER - Much more
Prefer regular brand - Much more
Prefer YORK FILTER - Little more
Prefer regular brand - Little more
No Preference
